title: Crystal Palace boss Sam Allardyce to make shock £10m swoop for Tottenham left-back Ben Davies
text:
Crystal Palace boss Sam Allardyce to make shock £10m swoop for Tottenham left-back Ben Davies 
Eagles chief hoping to add Welsh international defender to his struggling squad Exclusive Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments CRYSTAL PALACE boss Sam Allardyce is making a shock £10 million move for Tottenham left back Ben Davies. 
But Spurs want TWICE as much for their second choice defender as they go for the double. Action Images via Reuters 4 Crystal Palace are making a £10m move for Ben Davies 
The Palace chief turned to Davies after failing to talk old club Sunderland into selling first choice Patrick van Aanholt. 
Keep up-to-date with all the latest transfer news and gossip in the January window with SunSport’s daily LIVE blog. Reuters The Welsh international could be on his way to Selhurst Park Getty Images Big Sam is attempting to bolster his defence at Palace News Group Newspapers Ltd 4 Davies has found himself second-choice behind Danny Rose for Spurs 
Black Cats owner Ellis Short refuses to deal with a relegation rival and has snubbed an offer for van Aanholt also in the £10 million range. 
Now Palace are trying to get Davies out of Spurs but face a mighty battle as he is needed for the title push and the Europa League campaign.
